The target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 18 (4d8) psychic damage and become memory drained until it finishes a short or long rest or until it benefits from the greater restoration or heal spell. Constructs, Oozes, Plants, and Undead succeed on the save automatically.

While memory drained, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from its ability checks and attack rolls. Each time the target is memory drained beyond the first, the die size increases by one: the d4 becomes a d6, the d6 becomes a d8, and so on until the die becomes a d20, at which point the target becomes unconscious for 1 hour. The effect then ends.
The oblex learns all the languages a memory-drained target knows and gains all its skill proficiencies.

monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this distance), passive Perception 14

monsters.name: Air Elemental Myrmidon

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmidon makes three Flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike
entries: The myrmidon makes one Flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

monsters.languages: Auran, one language of its creator's choice

monsters.name: Alhoon

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The alhoon makes two Chilling Grasp or Arcane Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Chilling Grasp
entries: ms 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the alhoon regains 14 hit points.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
entries: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 28 (8d6) force damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast 5
entries: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.skills: Arcana +8, Deception +7, History +8, Insight +7, Perception +7, Stealth +5

traits.name: Abyssal Rift
entries: If the alkilith surrounds a door, window, or similar opening continuously for 6d6 days, the opening becomes a permanent portal to a random layer of the Abyss.

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The alkilith can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: If the alkilith is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the alkilith move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the alkilith isn't ordinary slime or fungus.

traits.name: Foment Confusion
entries: Any creature that isn't a demon that starts its turn within 30 feet of the alkilith must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw, or it hears a faint buzzing in its head for a moment and has disadvantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

If the saving throw against Foment Confusion fails by 5 or more, the creature is instead subjected to the confusion spell for 1 minute (no concentration required by the alkilith). While under the effect of that confusion, the creature is immune to Foment Confusion.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The alkilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The alkilith can climb difficult surfaces, such as upside down on ceilings, without making an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The alkilith doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The alkilith makes three Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) acid damage.

monsters.name: Allip

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The allip can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The allip doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Maddening Touch
entries: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Howling Babble
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the allip that can hear it must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage, and it is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned. Constructs and Undead are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Whispers of Compulsion
entries: The allip chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the allip's choice that the allip can see. Constructs and Undead are immune to this effect.

monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the amnizu's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The amnizu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The amnizu uses Blinding Rot or Forgetfulness, if available. It also makes two Taskmaster Whip attacks.

actions.name: Taskmaster Whip
entries: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Blinding Rot
entries: The amnizu targets one or two creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and be blinded until the start of the amnizu's next turn.

actions.name: Forgetfulness
entries: The amnizu targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. That creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 26 (4d12) psychic damage and become stunned for 1 minute. A stunned creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target is stunned for the full minute, it forgets everything it sensed, experienced, and learned during the last 5 hours.

traits.name: Two Heads
entries: The sorrowsworn has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Rising Anger
entries: If another creature deals damage to the sorrowsworn, the sorrowsworn's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a Hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 (3d12) psychic damage.
On its turn, the sorrowsworn has disadvantage on attack rolls if no other creature has dealt damage to it since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sorrowsworn makes two Hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The annis makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crushing Hug
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
entries: ms,rs 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The archdruid makes three Staff or Wildfire attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Staff
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Wildfire
entries: rs 9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) fire damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the druid's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The archer makes two Shortsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: rw 6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The armanite makes one Claw attack, one Hooves attack, and one Serrated Tail attack.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Serrated Tail
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Lance 5
entries: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line that is 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The dreadnought's eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, it decides which way the cone faces. The cone doesn't function while the eye is closed or while the dreadnought is blinded.

traits.name: Astral Entity
entries: The dreadnought can't leave the Astral Plane, nor can it be banished or otherwise transported out of that plane.

traits.name: Demiplanar Donjon
entries: Anything the dreadnought swallows is transported to a demiplane that can be entered by no other means except a wish spell or the dreadnought's Bite and Donjon Visit. A creature can leave the demiplane only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the plane shift spell. The demiplane resembles a stone cave roughly 1,000 feet in diameter with a ceiling 100 feet high. Like a stomach, it contains the remains of past meals. The dreadnought can't be harmed from within the demiplane. If the dreadnought dies, the demiplane disappears, and everything inside it appears around the dreadnought's corpse. The demiplane is otherwise indestructible.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dreadnought fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Sever Silver Cord
entries: If the dreadnought scores a critical hit against a creature traveling by means of the astral projection spell, the dreadnought can cut the target's silver cord instead of dealing damage.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The dreadnought doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreadnought makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (5d10 + 9) force damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and this damage reduces it to 0 hit points or it is incapacitated, the dreadnought swallows it. The swallowed target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, appears in an unoccupied space on the floor of the Demiplanar Donjon.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The dreadnought makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Donjon Visit (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One Huge or smaller creature that the dreadnought can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a 19 Charisma saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space on the floor of the Demiplanar Donjon. At the end of the target's next turn, it reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

legendary.name: Psychic Projection (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the dreadnought must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw, taking 26 (4d10 + 4) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Gore
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the aurochs moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone if it is a creature.

traits.name: Enchanting Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: rw 7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The babau makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting or Weakening Gaze.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Weakening Gaze
entries: The babau targets one creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Dread
entries: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Bael must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of him until the start of its next turn. A creature succeeds on this saving throw automatically if Bael wishes it or if he is incapacitated.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Bael fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Bael have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: Bael regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Bael dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Bael makes two Hellish Morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Hellish Morningstar
entries: mw 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) force damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Infernal Command
entries: Each of Bael's allies within 60 feet of him can't be charmed or frightened until the end of his next turn.

actions.name: Teleport
entries: Bael teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Fiendish Magic
entries: Bael uses Spellcasting or Teleport.

legendary.name: Infernal Command
entries: Bael uses Infernal Command.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Bael makes one Hellish Morningstar attack.

monsters.name: Balhannoth

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

monsters.senses: blindsight 500 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 16

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack against one creature it has grappled.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The balhannoth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Vanish
entries: The balhannoth magically becomes invisible for up to 10 minutes or until immediately after it makes an attack roll.

monsters.name: Banderhobb

traits.name: Resonant Connection
entries: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The banderhobb makes one Bite attack and one Tongue attack. It can replace one attack with a use of Shadow Step.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 16) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the banderhobb can't use its Bite attack or Tongue attack on another target.

actions.name: Tongue
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the target must make a 16 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the banderhobb.

actions.name: Shadow Step
entries: The banderhobb teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see.

actions.name: Swallow
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature grappled by the banderhobb. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. The creature is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the banderhobb, and it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the banderhobb's turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stops taking the necrotic damage and becomes stable.

The banderhobb can have only one creature swallowed at a time. While the banderhobb isn't incapacitated, it can regurgitate the creature at any time (no action required) in a space within 5 feet of it. The creature exits prone. If the banderhobb dies, it likewise regurgitates a swallowed creature.

monsters.languages: understands Common and the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Baphomet makes one Bite attack, one Gore attack, and one Heartcleaver attack. He also uses Frightful Presence.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
entries: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage. If Baphomet moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 25 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

actions.name: Heartcleaver
entries: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.
If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Heartcleaver Attack
entries: Baphomet makes one Heartcleaver attack.

legendary.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Baphomet moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attack||opportunity attacks, then makes a Gore attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The bard makes two Shortsword or Shortbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Cacophony 4
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the bard must make a 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the bard. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

monsters.name: Barghest

traits.name: Fire Banishment
entries: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 10 feet high or wide, it must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or be instantly banished to Gehenna

traits.name: Soul Feeding
entries: The barghest can feed on the corpse of a Fey or Humanoid it killed within the past 10 minutes. This feeding takes at least 1 minute, and it destroys the corpse. The victim's soul is trapped in the barghest for 24 hours, after which time it is digested and the person is incapable of being revived. If the barghest dies before the soul is digested, the soul is released. While a soul is trapped in the barghest, any magic that tries to restore the soul to life has a 50 chance of failing and being wasted.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The barghest makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Goblin, Infernal, telepathy 60 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The berbalang makes one Bite attack and one
Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

traits.name: Control Weather (1/Day)
entries: The hag can cast the control weather spell, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Graystaff Magic
entries: The hag carries a graystaff, a magic staff. The hag can use its flying speed only while astride the staff. If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff

traits.name: Ice Walk
entries: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check, and difficult terrain||3 composed of ice or snow doesn't cost the hag extra moment.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two Slam or Frost Shard attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Frost Shard
entries: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 30 (6d8 + 3) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hag's next turn.

actions.name: Horrific Feast
entries: The hag feeds on the corpse of one enemy within reach that died within the past minute. Each creature of the hag's choice that is within 60 feet and able to see the feeding must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the hag for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature is incapacitated, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrific Feast for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The abishai makes one Bite attack and two Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The blackguard makes three attacks, using Glaive, Shortbow, or both.

actions.name: Glaive
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: rw 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the blackguard for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The abishai makes three Bite or Lightning Strike attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike
entries: rs 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 36 (8d8) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Bodak

traits.name: Death Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the bodak's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the bodak, the bodak can force it to make a 13 Constitution saving throw if the bodak isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points unless it is immune to the frightened condition. Otherwise, a creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the bodak until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the bodak in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The bodak takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The bodak doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Fist
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Withering Gaze
entries: One creature that the bodak can see within 60 feet of it must make a 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.languages: Abyssal, the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Pummel
entries: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Oil Puddle
entries: The boggle creates a puddle of nonflammable oil. The puddle is 1 inch deep and covers the ground in the boggle's space. The puddle is difficult terrain||3 for all creatures except boggles and lasts for 1 hour. The oil has one of the following additional effects of the boggle's choice:

{"type":"list","style":"list-hang-notitle","items":[{"name":"Slippery Oil","type":"item","entries":["Any non-boggle creature that enters the puddle or starts its turn there must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone."]},{"name":"Sticky Oil","type":"item","entries":["Any non-boggle creature that enters the puddle or starts its turn there must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be restrained. On its turn, a creature can use an action to try to extricate itself, ending the effect and moving into the nearest unoccupied space of its choice with a successful 11 Strength check."]}]}

monsters.name: Boneclaw

traits.name: Rejuvenation
entries: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in 1d10 hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw's master.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The boneclaw doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The boneclaw makes two Piercing Claw attacks.

actions.name: Piercing Claw
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, and the target is grappled (escape 14). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

actions.name: Shadow Jump 5
entries: If the boneclaw is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the boneclaw's choice within 15 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or take 34 (5d12 + 2) necrotic damage.

The boneclaw then teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can bring one creature it's grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination. The destination spaces of this teleportation must be in dim light or darkness.

monsters.languages: Common plus one language spoken by its master

actions.name: Stomp
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 27 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Tail
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 32 (6d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage

traits.name: Rotting Presence
entries: When any creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet of the bulezau, that creature must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulezau's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The bulezau has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Barbed Tail
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease ends. While poisoned in this way, the target sports festering boils, coughs up flies, and sheds rotting skin, and the target must repeat the saving throw after every 24 hours that elapse. On a successful save, the disease ends. On a failed save, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by 4 (1d8). The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

monsters.name: Cadaver Collector

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The collector has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The collector doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The collector makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath 5
entries: The collector releases paralyzing gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a successful 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

monsters.languages: understands all languages but can't speak

traits.name: Dimensional Lock
entries: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Uncanny Senses
entries: The canoloth can't be surprised unless it's incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The canoloth makes one Bite or Tongue attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

actions.name: Tongue
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 15), pulled up to 30 feet toward the canoloth, and restrained until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.

traits.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.

actions.name: Tail
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (5d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the start of the catoblepas's next turn.

actions.name: Death Ray 5
entries: The catoblepas targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target instead takes 64 necrotic damage. The target dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this ray.

traits.name: Flammable Blood
entries: If the cave fisher drops to half its hit points or fewer, it gains vulnerability to fire damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The cave fisher can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The cave fisher makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Retract Filament
entries: One Large or smaller creature grappled by the cave fisher's Adhesive Filament must make a 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cave fisher, and the cave fisher makes one Claw attack against it. Anyone else who was attached to the filament is released. Until the grapple ends on the target, the cave fisher can't use Adhesive Filament.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The champion makes three Greatsword or Shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: rw 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The chitine has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the chitine to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the chitine has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the chitine knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
entries: The chitine ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The chitine makes three Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Aberrant Quickness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The choker can take an extra action on its turn.

traits.name: Boneless
entries: The choker can move through and occupy a space as narrow as 4 inches wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The choker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The choker makes two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the choker can't use this tentacle on another target. The choker has two tentacles. If this attack is a critical hit, the target also can't breathe or speak until the grapple ends.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The choldrith has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the choldrith to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The choldrith can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the choldrith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the choldrith knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
entries: The choldrith ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Web 5
entries: rw 5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a 11 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 5 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

monsters.name: Clockwork Bronze Scout

traits.name: Earth Armor
entries: The clockwork doesn't provoke opportunity attack||opportunity attacks when it burrows.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Flare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each creature in contact with the ground within 15 feet of the clockwork must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

monsters.name: Clockwork Iron Cobra

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer one random effect (roll a d6):

If it's holding no weapon, it makes an unarmed strike. If no creature is visible within 30 feet, it takes the Dash action, moving toward the nearest creature."]},{"name":"34: Paralysis","type":"item","entries":["The target is paralyzed until the end of its next turn."]},{"name":"56: Poison","type":"item","entries":["The target takes 13 (3d8) poison damage."]}]}

monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

monsters.name: Clockwork Oaken Bolter

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork makes two Lancing Bolt attacks or one Lancing Bolt attack and one Harpoon attack.

actions.name: Lancing Bolt
entries: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 100/400 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
entries: rw 7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 12). While grappled in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the clockwork. A creature takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. The clockwork can grapple only one creature at a time with its harpoon.

actions.name: Explosive Bolt 5
entries: The clockwork launches an explosive charge at a point within 120 feet. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

monsters.name: Clockwork Stone Defender

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Slam
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked prone.

monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

monsters.name: Cloud Giant Smiling One

traits.name: Control Weather (8th-level Spell)
entries: The giant can cast the control weather spell, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Slam attacks or two Telekinetic Strike attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Telekinetic Strike
entries: rs 7 to hit, range 240 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
entries: The giant magically transforms to look and feel like a Beast or a Humanoid it has seen or to return to its true form. Any equipment the giant is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. Its statistics, other than its size, don't change. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

monsters.skills: Deception +11, Insight +7, Perception +11, Sleight of hand +9

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The conjurer makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
entries: ms,rs 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) force damage.

monsters.name: Corpse Flower

traits.name: Corpses
entries: When first encountered, a corpse flower contains the corpses of 1d6 + 3 Humanoids. A corpse flower can hold the remains of up to nine Humanoids. These remains have Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the corpse flower. If the corpse flower dies, the corpses within it can be pulled free.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The corpse flower can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Stench of Death
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the corpse flower or one of its zombies must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, unless the creature is a Construct or an Undead. On a failed save, the creature is poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the Stench of Death of all corpse flowers for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The corpse flower makes three Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to all divination spells.

actions.name: Bite

monsters.name: Darkling

traits.name: Death Flash
entries: When the darkling dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the darkling has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

monsters.name: Darkling Elder

traits.name: Death Burn
entries: When the darkling elder dies, magical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area must make a 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 7 (2d6) radiant damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The darkling elder makes two Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Lightning Blood
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the death kiss takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage whenever it hits the death kiss with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The death kiss makes three Tentacle attacks. Up to three of these attacks can be replaced by Blood Drainone replacement per tentacle grappling a creature.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the death kiss can't use the same tentacle on another target. The death kiss has ten tentacles.

actions.name: Blood Drain
entries: One creature grappled by a tentacle of the death kiss must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) lightning damage, and the death kiss regains half as many hit points.

monsters.name: Deathlock

traits.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The deathlock doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathlock makes two Deathly Claw or Grave Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Deathly Claw
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Grave Bolt
entries: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) necrotic damage.

monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

monsters.name: Deathlock Mastermind

traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the deathlock's darkvision.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The deathlock doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 13 (3d8) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or become restrained as shadowy tendrils wrap around it for 1 minute. A restrained target can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

monsters.name: Deathlock Wight

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the deathlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The deathlock doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathlock makes two Life Drain or Grave Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Life Drain
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d8 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

A Humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the deathlock's control, unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The deathlock can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

actions.name: Grave Bolt
entries: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) necrotic damage.

monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The roth is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

actions.name: Gore
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the roth moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Deep Scion

traits.name: Amphibious (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The deep scion can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep scion makes two Battleaxe attacks, or it makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Bite (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Psychic Screech (Hybrid Form Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The deep scion emits a terrible scream audible within 300 feet. Creatures within 30 feet of the deep scion must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of the deep scion's next turn. In water, the psychic screech also telepathically transmits the deep scion's memories of the last 24 hours to its master, regardless of distance, so long as it and its master are in the same body of water.

monsters.skills: Deception +6, Insight +3, Sleight of hand +3, Stealth +3

traits.name: Pounce
entries: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deinonychus makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Demogorgon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Demogorgon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Two Heads
entries: Demogorgon has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, deafened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Demogorgon makes two Tentacle attacks. He can replace one attack with a use of Gaze.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (3d12 + 9) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Gaze
entries: Demogorgon turns his magical gaze toward one creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 23 Wisdom saving throw or suffer one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d6):

{"type":"list","style":"list-hang-notitle","items":[{"type":"item","name":"12: Beguiling Gaze","entries":["The target is stunned until the start of Demogorgon's next turn or until Demogorgon is no longer within line of sight."]},{"type":"item","name":"34: Confusing Gaze","entries":["The target suffers the effect of the confusion spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the start of Demogorgon's next turn. Demogorgon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell."]},{"type":"item","name":"56: Hypnotic Gaze","entries":["The target is charmed by Demogorgon until the start of Demogorgon's next turn. Demogorgon chooses how the charmed target uses its action, reaction, and movement."]}]}

legendary.name: Gaze
entries: Demogorgon uses Gaze and must use either Beguiling Gaze or Confusing Gaze.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Demogorgon uses Spellcasting.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Hooked Spear
entries: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the derro can choose to deal no damage and knock it prone.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
entries: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Chromatic Beam
entries: The derro launches a brilliant beam of magical energy in a 5-foot-wide line that is 60 feet long. Each creature in the line must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: A devourer doesn't require air, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The devourer makes two Claw attacks and can use either Imprison Soul or Soul Rend, if available.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Imprison Soul
entries: The devourer chooses a living Humanoid with 0 hit points that it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature is teleported inside the devourer's ribcage and imprisoned there. While imprisoned in this way, the creature is restrained and has disadvantage on death saving throws. If the creature dies while imprisoned, the devourer regains 25 hit points and immediately recharges Soul Rend. Additionally, at the start of its next turn, the devourer regurgitates the slain creature as a bonus action, and the creature becomes an undead. If the victim had 2 or fewer Hit Dice, it becomes a zombie. If it had 3 to 5 Hit Dice, it becomes a ghoul. Otherwise, it becomes a wight. A devourer can imprison only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Soul Rend
entries: The devourer creates a vortex of life-draining energy in a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Dhergoloth

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dhergoloth makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Flailing Claws 5
entries: The dhergoloth moves up to its speed in a straight line and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (3d12 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Teleport
entries: The dhergoloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The troll dies only if it is hit by an attack that deals 10 or more acid or fire damage while the troll has 0 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes one Bite attack and four Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the troll must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) radiant damage.

entries: The diviner magically creates a burst of illumination in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of the diviner's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the dolphin moved at least 30 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the dolphin's next turn.

monsters.name: Drow Arachnomancer

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The drow can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries: The drow ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drow makes three attacks, using Bite, Poisonous Touch, Web, or a combination of them. One attack can be replaced by a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Bite (Spider Form Only)
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Poisonous Touch (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 35 (10d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Web (Spider Form Only; 5)
entries: rw 8 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a 15 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

entries: The drow discerns when a creature in earshot speaks a lie in a language the drow knows.

entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: The drow wields a tentacle rod.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drow makes two Demon Staff attacks or one Demon Staff attack and three Tentacle Rod attacks.

actions.name: Demon Staff
entries: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the drow for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Tentacle Rod
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is hit three times by the tentacle rod|DMG|rod on one turn, the target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or suffer the following effects for 1 minute: the target's speed is halved, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions. Moreover, on each of its turns, it can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Divine Flame (2/Day)
entries: A 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high column of divine fire sprouts in an area up to 120 feet away from the drow. Each creature in the column must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Compel Demon
entries: An allied demon within 30 feet of the drow uses its reaction to make one attack against a target of the drow's choice that she can see.

legendary.name: Demon Staff
entries: The drow makes one Demon Staff attack.

If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries: When the duergar suffers a critical hit or is reduced to 0 hit points, psychic energy erupts from its frame to deal 14 (4d6) psychic damage to each creature within 5 feet of it.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The duergar makes two Iron Fist attacks and two Stomping Foot attacks. After one of the attacks, the duergar can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attack||opportunity attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a use of Flame Jet.

actions.name: Iron Fist
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 30 feet away in a straight line and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Stomping Foot
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, or 21 (3d10 + 5) to a prone target.

actions.name: Flame Jet
entries: The duergar spews flames in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The hammerer deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hammerer makes one Claw attack and one Hammer attack.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hammer
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Cavalry Training
entries: When the duergar hits a target with a melee attack while mounted, the mount can use its reaction to make one melee attack against the same target.

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against spells and the charmed, paralyzed, and poisoned conditions.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: War Pick
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: rw 2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shared Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The duergar magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it forces a creature to make a saving throw, or its concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it. While the invisible duergar is mounted, the mount is invisible as well. The invisibility ends early on the mount immediately after it attacks.

monsters.name: Duergar Mind Master

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against spells and the charmed, paralyzed, and poisoned conditions.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Mind-Poison Dagger
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, or 1 piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage while under the effect of Reduce.

actions.name: Invisibility 4
entries: The duergar magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it forces a creature to make a saving throw, or its concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

actions.name: Mind Mastery
entries: The duergar targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Intelligence saving throw, or the duergar causes it to use its reaction, if available, either to make one weapon attack against another creature the duergar can see or to move up to 10 feet in a direction of the duergar's choice. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this effect.

monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 30 ft., passive Perception 12
