entries: Muiral makes three attacks: two with his longsword and one with his sting.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Sting
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. The target must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Cast Cantrip
entries: Muiral casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Lunging Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Muiral makes one longsword attack that has a reach of 10 feet.

legendary.name: Retreating Strike (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Muiral moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Before the move, he can make one longsword attack.

monsters.name: Nester
monsters.languages: Auran, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Giant, Terran

traits.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The weird is invisible while fully immersed in toxic brew.

traits.name: Brew Bound
entries: The weird dies if forced to leave the basin of toxic brew it inhabits, or if a purify food and drink spell is cast on the brew.

traits.name: Poisonous Body
entries: A creature takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns while grappled by a poison weird.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the scaladar is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage, and its sting deals an extra 11 (2d10) lightning damage until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Scaladar Link
entries: The scaladar knows the location of other scaladar within 100 feet of it, and it can sense when any of them take damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The scaladar makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15). The scaladar has two claws, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Sting
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Shadow Assassin

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The assassin can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the assassin can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in sunlight, the assassin has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two Shadow Blade attacks.

actions.name: Shadow Blade
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4 each time it is hit by this attack. The target dies if its Strength is reduced to 0. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a shadow (see the Monster Manual) rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

monsters.name: Shockerstomper

traits.name: Disable
entries: When a leg drops to 0 hit points, it is disabled, and Shockerstomper can use a reaction to detach it from its main body. Whenever one of its legs is disabled, Shockerstomper's walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. The whole contraption topples over and shuts down if four of its seven legs are disabled.

traits.name: Electrified Surface
entries: A creature that ends its turn in contact with Shockerstomper's body (saucer or turrets) must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Immutable Form
entries: Shockerstomper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Control Module
entries: A creature atop or above Shockerstomper's platform can locate its control module with a successful 15 Intelligence (Investigation) check or Wisdom (Perception) check. As an action, a character can try to open the control module's access panel, either by tearing it off with a successful 25 Strength (Athletics) check or by dislodging it with thieves' tools and a successful 25 Dexterity check. Behind the panel, embedded in the floor of the control module, is a 5-foot-diameter pulsating crystal hemisphere with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Destroying the crystal hemisphere shuts down Shockerstomper.

traits.name: Lightning Turret
entries: A character can try to plug the nozzle of a lightning turret with a 10-pound rock or similar object, doing so with a successful 15 Strength (Athletics) check. A plugged turret can't shoot lightning until a creature uses an action to try to clear the obstruction, which requires another successful 15 Strength (Athletics) check. Shockerstomper has no ability to clear an obstruction itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Shockerstomper makes three Lightning Turret attacks and two Stomp attacks.

actions.name: Lightning Turret
entries: The turret shoots a magical lightning bolt at one creature within 60 feet of Shockerstomper. The target must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Stomp
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 5

monsters.name: Stonecloak
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Infernal, and Undercommon but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Trenzia uses Lightning Ray twice.

actions.name: Fire Ray
entries: rs 5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

traits.name: Necrotic Absorption
entries: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to necrotic damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

monsters.name: Valtagar Steelshadow
monsters.languages: Common, Dwarvish, Infernal, Terran, Troglodyte, Undercommon

traits.name: Shapechanger
entries: The werebat can use its action to polymorph into a Medium bat-humanoid hybrid, or into a Large giant bat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Echolocation (Bat or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The werebat has blindsight out to a range of 60 feet as long as it's not deafened.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The werebat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Nimble Escape (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: The werebat can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the werebat has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: In humanoid form, the werebat makes two scimitar attacks or two shortbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can make one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the werebat gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebat lycanthropy.

actions.name: Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: rw 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Zorak has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

traits.name: Shapechanger
entries: If Zorak isn't in sunlight or running water, he can use his action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into his true form.

While in bat form, Zorak can't speak, his walking speed is 5 feet, and he has a flying speed of 30 feet. His statistics, other than his size and speed, are unchanged. Anything he is wearing transforms with it, but nothing he is carrying does. He reverts to his true form if he dies.

While in mist form, Zorak can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. He is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and he can't pass through water. He has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and he is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage he takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Zorak fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
entries: When he drops to 0 hit points outside his resting place, Zorak transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that he isn't in sunlight or running water. If he can't transform, he is destroyed.

While he has 0 hit points in mist form, he can't revert to his vampire form, and he must reach his resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in his resting place, he reverts to his vampire form. He is then paralyzed until he regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in his resting place with 0 hit points, he regains 1 hit point.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: Zorak regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If Zorak takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of Zorak's next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: Zorak can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: Zorak has the following flaws:

{"type":"list","style":"list-hang-subtrait","items":[{"type":"itemSub","name":"Forbiddance","entry":"Zorak can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants."},{"type":"itemSub","name":"Harmed by Running Water","entry":"Zorak takes 20 acid damage if he ends his turn in running water."},{"type":"itemSub","name":"Stake to the Heart","entry":"If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into Zorak's heart while Zorak is incapacitated in his resting place, Zorak is paralyzed until the stake is removed."},{"type":"itemSub","name":"Sunlight Hypersensitivity","entry":"Zorak takes 20 radiant damage when he starts his turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, he has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks"}]}

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Zorak makes two attacks with his dwarven thrower, only one of which can be a ranged attack.

actions.name: Dwarven Thrower
entries: mw,rw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, or 12 (1d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack. On a ranged attack that hits, the hammer deals an extra 1d8 bludgeoning damage (2d8 if the target is a giant). If thrown, the weapon flies back to Zorak's hand after the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
entries: Zorak makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Zorak can grapple the target (escape 18).

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by Zorak, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Zorak regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces his hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under Zorak's control.

actions.name: Charm
entries: Zorak targets one humanoid he can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see Zorak, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by Zorak. The charmed target regards Zorak as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under Zorak's control, it takes Zorak's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for Zorak's bite attack.

Each time Zorak or Zorak's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until Zorak is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
entries: Zorak magically calls 2d4 swarms of swarm of bats||bats or swarm of rats||rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, Zorak can call 3d6 wolf||wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of Zorak and obeying his spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until Zorak dies, or until Zorak dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Zorak moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Zorak makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Zorak makes one bite attack.

monsters.name: Zox Clammersham
monsters.languages: Aquan, Auran, Common, Gnomish, Ignan, Terran

traits.name: Two Heads
entries: The amphisbaena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The amphisbaena makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The croaker can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Spear
entries: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Glaaar-pat (3/Day)
entries: The croaker sings a song of marshy doom. Each chosen creature within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song must make a 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw also has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Rooooo-glog (1/Day)
entries: The croaker sings an ode to an elder froghemoth. Each bullywug within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song gains 10 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The royal can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Frog Rider
entries: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: The royal's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The royal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The royal makes two attacks: one with its royal spear and one with its bite.

actions.name: Royal Spear
entries: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Croaked Decree (1/Day)
entries: The royal makes a loud pronouncement. Each bullywug within 60 feet of the royal that can hear the pronouncement has advantage on its next attack roll.

monsters.name: Drowned Ascetic

traits.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned ascetic cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

traits.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned ascetic shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned ascetic to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned ascetic drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drowned ascetic makes three unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

monsters.name: Drowned Assassin

traits.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned assassin cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

traits.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned assassin shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned assassin to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned assassin drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drowned assassin makes two hand crossbow attacks or two dagger attacks. It can then take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Reveal (1/Day)
entries: The drowned assassin removes its mask, revealing its rotting face. Each creature of the assassin's choice within 30 feet of it that can see the assassin must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

monsters.name: Drowned Blade

traits.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned blade cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

traits.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned blade shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned blade to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned blade drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drowned blade makes two rusted longsword attacks.

actions.name: Rusted Longsword
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

monsters.name: Drowned Master

traits.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned master shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Cold Aura
entries: At the start of each of the drowned master's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage. A creature that touches the drowned master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned master to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned master drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drowned master makes two attacks: one with its greatsword and one with its Life-Draining Tentacle.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Life-Draining Tentacle
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. On a failed save, the target also contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Necrotic Ink 5
entries: The drowned master discharges foul ink in front of itself in a 30-foot cone. Each creature caught in the ink must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is blinded until the end of its next turn and contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a short-term madness|DMG effect (determined randomly or by the DM; see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness). The effect lasts 10 minutes.

traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Luring Maestro
entries: While within 60 feet of the matriarch, creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the matriarch's Luring Song.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The matriarch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The matriarch makes two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fleeting Form
entries: The matriarch can magically disguise itself to resemble a humanoid of roughly similar size and shape for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. This illusion does not hold up to close scrutiny.

actions.name: Luring Song
entries: The matriarch sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the matriarch that can hear the song must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The matriarch must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the matriarch is incapacitated.

While charmed by the matriarch, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the charmed target is more than 5 feet away from the matriarch, the target must move on its turn toward the matriarch by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the matriarch, the target can repeat the saving throw. A charmed target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this matriarch's song for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Visage of Desire (1/Day)
entries: The matriarch projects a vision into the minds of creatures within 30 feet of it that aren't constructs or undead, showing each creature achieving whatever it most desires. An affected creature must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Juvenile Kraken

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The kraken can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain||3, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with a use of Fling.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. One Medium or two smaller creatures can be swallowed at the same time.

If the kraken takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in spaces within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 20). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Fling
entries: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Lightning Strike
entries: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, Primordial, telepathy 60 ft. but can't speak

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack.

legendary.name: Fling
entries: The kraken uses Fling.

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the koalinth can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the koalinth that isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Trident
entries: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Martial Advantage

A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to this peryton's Warp Shadow for 24 hours.

actions.name: Whirlpool (1/Day)
entries: The wave shaper targets a body of water at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep, causing a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, 25 feet tall, and lasts for 1 minute or until the wave shaper is incapacitated. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by succeeding on a 14 Strength (Athletics) check.

When a creature enters the vortex for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a 14 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and is caught in the vortex until it ends. On a success, the creature takes half damage and isn't caught in the vortex. A creature caught in the vortex can use its action to try to swim away from the vortex as described above, but it has disadvantage on the Strength (Athletics) check to do so.
The first time each turn that an object enters the vortex, the object takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. This damage occurs each round it remains in the vortex.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ancient deep crow beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the deep crow must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The ancient deep crow can then fly up to half its flying speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Auspicia makes two attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Brahma has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Taunt (2/Day)
entries: Brahma can use a bonus action to target one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can hear Brahma, it must succeed on a 13 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Brahma's next turn.

actions.name: War Lute
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Song of Domination (3/Day)
entries: Brahma targets one creature that can see or hear her, which must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by her for 1 minute. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. It has disadvantage on these saves if being charmed by Brahma is something the target openly or secretly desires. For 1 hour after the charm effect ends, the target has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma checks made as part of a contest with Brahma.

monsters.name: Chaos Quadrapod

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chaos quadrapod has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The chaos quadrapod makes up to two tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The chaos quadrapod can grapple no more than two targets at a time.

actions.name: Chaos Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The chaos quadrapod shoots forth a knot of roiling ethereal light that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14

monsters.name: Clockwork Dragon

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the clockwork dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a metal statue.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath 5
entries: The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

monsters.name: Deep Crow

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deep crow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the deep crow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.

actions.name: Mandibles
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Champion Challenge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Donaar causes each creature of his choice that he can see within 30 feet of him to make a 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature can't willingly move more than 30 feet away from Donaar. This effect ends on the creature if Donaar is incapacitated or dies, or if the creature is moved more than 30 feet away from him.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Donaar makes two attacks with his greatsword or his whip.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. Whenever Donaar rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

actions.name: Whip
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Vomit
entries: Donaar regurgitates acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Jim Darkmagic

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Jim carries a wand of wonder.

traits.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after Jim Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
entries: As a bonus action, Jim teleports up to 30 feet to a space he can see. The space must be unoccupied or occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature. If the latter, Jim and the willing creature both teleport, swapping places.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Minor Conjuration
entries: Jim conjures an inanimate object, no larger than 3 feet on a side and no more than 10 pounds, in his hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space he can see within 10 feet of him. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet. It disappears if it takes any damage, after 1 hour, or when Jim uses this feature again.

monsters.skills: Acrobatics +5, Animal handling +4, Arcana +7, History +7, Performance +5

monsters.name: K'thriss Drow'b

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: K'thriss wears a robe of stars (accounted for in his statistics). The robe allows him to cast the following spells: 6/day: magic missile (7 missiles)

traits.name: Awakened Mind
entries: K'thriss can telepathically speak to any creature he can see within 30 feet of him, provided the creature can understand at least one language.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: K'thriss has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep. Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, K'thriss has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: K'thriss makes two attacks with his sickle.

actions.name: Sickle
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

monsters.languages: Celestial, Common, Elvish, Undercommon; can read all writing
monsters.savingThrows: STR +0, DEX +3, CON +2, INT +3, WIS +3, CHA +7

traits.name: Customizable Storage
entries: A keg robot can hold up to three types of liquid payload totaling 12 gallons within its hollow, barrel-shaped body. A full keg robot can make one liquid attack per gallon before the liquid must be refilled. Filling a keg robot takes 2 rounds per gallon. Differing payloads can alter the keg robot's attacks from those presented here.

actions.name: Fist
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Acid Squirt
entries: rw 5 to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) acid damage.

actions.name: Beer Shower
entries: The keg robot spews an unnaturally potent beer in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature has its speed halved by exposure to the potent brew. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
Additionally, the beer shower extinguishes any fires or open flames in its area.

actions.name: Hot Oil Spray 5
entries: The keg robot sprays hot oil in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 (1d8 + 3) fire damage and falls prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall prone.
Any creature affected by the hot oil spray that takes fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute) takes an additional 3 (1d6) fire damage, and the oil burns away.

If the oil that remains in the area of the spray is lit, it burns for 1d4 rounds and deals 3 (1d6) fire damage to any creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

monsters.name: Mrgn

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Mrgn has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Mrgn makes three attacks with her scimitars or her longbow.

actions.name: Scimitars
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: rw 6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.skills: Athletics +3, Insight +4, Nature +3, Perception +4, Stealth +6, Survival +4

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Oak has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Oak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Oak makes three attacks with his hooked daggers or his hand crossbow.

actions.name: Hooked Dagger
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Omin Dran

traits.name: Divine Strike
entries: Once on each of his turns when he hits a creature with a weapon attack, Omin can cause the attack to deal an extra 4 (1d8) damage of the same type dealt by the weapon.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Omin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Omin makes two attacks with his maul.

actions.name: Maul
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.skills: Deception +4, Insight +7, Intimidation +4, Medicine +7, Perception +7, Persuasion +4

traits.name: Echo Spell (1/Day)
entries: Pendragon can cast the spell he cast on his last turn, whose casting time becomes 1 bonus action. This bonus casting uses a spell slot as normal.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Divine Display (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, Phoenix causes his shield to flare with divine light. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Phoenix makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Portentia deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Portentia that isn't incapacitated and Portentia doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Portentia makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
entries: Portentia magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (her choice). In a new form, Portentia retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that she lacks.

traits.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, Prophetess can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Prophetess expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Prophetess has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

actions.name: Maul
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Brave
entries: Rosie has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Rosie can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than hers.

traits.name: Evasion
entries: If Rosie is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

traits.name: Shadow Step
entries: When Rosie is in dim light or darkness, she can use a bonus action to teleport 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see that is also in dim light or darkness. She then has advantage on the first melee attack she makes before the end of the turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Rosie makes three attacks, then makes two unarmed strike attacks.

actions.name: Staff of the Master (+1 Quarterstaff)
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. Rosie's unarmed strikes are magical.

traits.name: Defensive Advantage
entries: As long as two or more of Splugoth's allies are within 5 feet of him and are not incapacitated, attack rolls against him are made with disadvantage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Splugoth can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

traits.name: Touch of Madness
entries: Splugoth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Splugoth makes two attacks with his dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Word From Beyond (1/Day)
entries: Splugoth remembers and repeats aloud a few words from a place he entered while walking back from the next world to this one. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him that can hear him must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Viari

traits.name: Evasion
entries: If Viari is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

traits.name: Second-Story Work
entries: Climbing does not cost Viari extra movement. Additionally, when he makes a running jump, the distance he covers increases by 5 feet.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Viari deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Viari that isn't incapacitated and Viari doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Viari makes two attacks with his shortsword and two attacks with his rapier.

actions.name: +1 Shortsword
entries: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
entries: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

monsters.skills: Acrobatics +11, Athletics +7, Perception +5, Performance +5, Persuasion +5, Sleight of hand +11, Stealth +8

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Walnut has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: Walnut can attempt to hide even when she is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Wild Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Walnut can assume the shape of a dire wolf. She can stay in this form for 3 hours or until she reverts to her normal form as a bonus action. She automatically reverts if she falls unconscious, drops to 0 hit points, or dies.
While transformed, Walnut's game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the dire wolf, except she retains her alignment, personality, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.
Her attacks in beast form are magical. While in beast form, Walnut can use a bonus action to expend one spell slot and regain 1d8 hit points per level of the spell slot expended.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Walnut makes two attacks with Foremother or her longbow.

actions.name: Foremother (+1 Scimitar)
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Alien Mind
entries: If a creature tries to read Belashyrra's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a 22 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Eye Thief
entries: Belashyrra can see through the eyes of all creatures within 120 feet of it. It can use its Eye Ray through any creature within 120 feet of it, as though it were in that creature's space.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Belashyrra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Belashyrra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: Belashyrra regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Belashyrra dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Teleport
entries: As a bonus action, Belashyrra can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Belashyrra makes two attacks with its claws and uses its Eye Ray once.

actions.name: Claw
entries: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Eye Ray
entries: Belashyrra shoots one of the following magical eye rays of its choice, targeting one creature it can see within 120 feet of it:

{"type":"list","style":"list-hang-notitle","items":[{"type":"itemSub","name":"1. Psyche-Reconstruction Ray","entry":"The target must make a 22 Wisdom saving throw, taking 49 (9d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, it dies and transforms into a spectator under Belashyrra's control and acts immediately after Belashyrra in the initiative order. The target can't be returned to its original form by any means short of a wish spell."},{"type":"itemSub","name":"2. Until this blindness ends, Belashyrra can see through the blinded creature's eyes. The blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success."}]}

legendary.name: Claw
entries: Belashyrra makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Implant Fear (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Belashyrra targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (4d10) psychic damage and immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as far as its speed allows away from Belashyrra.

legendary.name: Rend Reality (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Belashyrra rips at the bonds of reality in its immediate area. Each creature within 10 feet of Belashyrra must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) force damage and gain one level of exhaustion.

traits.name: Commander of Bones
entries: As a bonus action, the knight can target one skeleton or zombie it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must obey the knight's commands until the knight dies or until the knight releases it as a bonus action. The knight can command up to twelve undead at a time this way.

traits.name: Master of the Pallid Banner
entries: While within 60 feet of the knight, any undead ally of the knight has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight attacks twice with one of its weapons.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Changeling

traits.name: Change Appearance
entries: The changeling can use its action to polymorph into a Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The changeling makes two attacks with its dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Unsettling Visage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the changeling must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.languages: Common, Dwarvish, Elvish, Halfling, Thieves' cant

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The clawfoot has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the clawfoot's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Pounce
entries: If the clawfoot moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the clawfoot can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The clawfoot makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Dolgaunt

traits.name: Evasion
entries: If the dolgaunt is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the dolgaunt instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the dolgaunt is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dolgaunt makes two tentacle attacks and two unarmed strikes. Up to two tentacle attacks can be replaced by Vitality Drain.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape 12) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the dolgaunt can't use the same tentacle on another target. The dolgaunt has two tentacles.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Vitality Drain
entries: One creature grappled by a tentacle of the dolgaunt must make a 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the dolgaunt regains a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14

traits.name: Dual Consciousness
entries: The dolgrim has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dolgrim makes three attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two Nightmare Touch attacks.

actions.name: Claws
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Touch
entries: ms 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 18 (4d6 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is unconscious, it takes an extra 10 (3d6) psychic damage and is cursed until the hag dies or the curse is removed. The cursed creature's hit point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10) whenever it finishes a long rest.

traits.name: Alien Mind
entries: If a creature tries to read Dyrrn's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a 23 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Dyrrn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Dyrrn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: Dyrrn regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If Dyrrn takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Dyrrn dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Teleport
entries: As a bonus action, Dyrrn can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Dyrrn makes one Tentacle Whip attack and uses its Corruption once. Dyrrn can replace its Tentacle Whip attack with Extract Brain if it has a creature grappled.

actions.name: Tentacle Whip
entries: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 23), pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of Dyrrn, and must succeed on a 23 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends. Dyrrn can't use the same tentacle whip on another target until this grapple ends. Dyrrn has two tentacle whips.

actions.name: Corruption
entries: Dyrrn targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw or take 22 (4d6 + 8) necrotic damage and become corrupted for 1 minute.

A corrupted creature's flesh twists in alien ways. The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls, its speed is reduced by half, and if it tries to cast a spell, it must first succeed on a 15 Intelligence check or the spell fails and is wasted. The corrupted creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Extract Brain
entries: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature grappled by Dyrrn. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Dyrrn kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

legendary.name: Tentacle Whip
entries: Dyrrn makes one attack with its Tentacle Whip.

legendary.name: Spawn Aberration (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Dyrrn regurgitates an intellect devourer in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The intellect devourer is under Dyrrn's control and acts immediately after Dyrrn in the initiative order.

legendary.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Dyrrn magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 23 Intelligence saving throw or take 30 (5d8 + 8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Expeditious Messenger

traits.name: Flyby
entries: The messenger doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the messenger is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.languages: one language spoken by its creator

traits.name: Quickness 5
entries: The fastieth can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The quori uses its Mind Thrust twice.

actions.name: Idyllic Touch
entries: ms 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or fall prone in a fit of laughter.

actions.name: Mind Thrust
entries: The quori targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Possession
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 16 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

traits.name: Dual Mind
entries: The Inspired has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Inspired makes two crysteel dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with vicious mockery.

actions.name: Crysteel Dagger
entries: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage.

actions.name: Vicious Mockery (Cantrip)
entries: The Inspired unleashes a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can hear the Inspired, the target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Iron Defender

traits.name: Keen Senses
entries: The defender has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the defender is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Bite
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or take an extra 3 (1d6) piercing damage and be grappled (escape 13). The defender can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: All-Around Vision
entries: The quori can't be surprised while it isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The quori can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The quori has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The quori makes two Soul Binding attacks. Alternatively, it can make four attacks with Arcane Blast.

actions.name: Arcane Blast
entries: rs 13 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 12 (1d10 + 7) force damage.

actions.name: Soul Binding
entries: ms 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 29 (4d10 + 7) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and has its soul imprisoned in one of the quori's eyes. The target can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell until the quori is destroyed.

actions.name: Mind Seed (1/Day)
entries: The quori touches one humanoid, which must succeed on a 21 Intelligence saving throw or be cursed. The curse lasts until it's removed by a remove curse or greater restoration spell.

The cursed target suffers 1 level of exhaustion every 24 hours, and finishing a long rest doesn't reduce its exhaustion. If the cursed target reaches exhaustion level 6, it doesn't die; it instead becomes a thrall under the quori's control, and all its exhaustion is removed. Only the wish spell can free the thrall from this control.

actions.name: Swarm of Eyes
entries: The quori creates a swarm of spectral eyes that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage, and it is blinded for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Possession
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

traits.name: Dual Mind
entries: The kalashtar has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Mind Thrust
entries: The kalashtar targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The soldier has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the soldier's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the soldier to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the soldier drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier attacks three times with one of its weapons.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Illmarrow fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Illmarrow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Illmarrow's body turns to dust when she drops to 0 hit points, and her equipment is left behind. She gains a new body after 1d10 days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within two hundred miles of the location at which she was destroyed.

actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
entries: rs 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Illmarrow's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against Illmarrow until the end of her next turn.

actions.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Poison Breath 5
entries: Illmarrow exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 (10d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned.

A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises at the start of Illmarrow's next turn as a zombie. The zombie acts immediately after Illmarrow in the initiative count and is permanently under her command, following her verbal orders.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Illmarrow casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: Illmarrow uses her Paralyzing Claw.

legendary.name: Frightening Presence (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Illmarrow targets up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Illmarrow's Frightening Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Poison Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Illmarrow recharges her Poison Breath and uses it.

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Magical Strike
entries: ms 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) fire damage.

actions.name: Spell Mimicry 5
entries: The living spell unleashes a thin sheet of flames in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

actions.name: Magical Strike
entries: ms 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (5d6 + 5) poison damage.

actions.name: Spell Mimicry 5
entries: The living spell creates a 40-foot-diameter sphere of fog within 60 feet of it (the fog spreads around corners). When a creature enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fog moves 10 feet away from the living spell at the start of each of its turns, rolling along the ground and through openings. The fog lasts for 10 minutes or until the living spell's concentration ends (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell).

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

actions.name: Magical Strike
entries: ms 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (5d6 + 4) lightning damage.

actions.name: Spell Mimicry 5
entries: The living spell unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Mordakhesh makes three greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.

actions.name: Chromatic Orb
entries: rs 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Mordakhesh makes one weapon attack or casts chromatic orb.

legendary.name: Chromatic Resistance
entries: Modakhesh gains resistance to one damage type of his choiceacid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunderuntil the start of his next turn.

legendary.name: Warlord's Command (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Mordakhesh targets up to two allies that he can see within 30 feet of him. If a target can see and hear him, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Aura of False Divinity
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the radiant idol must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw, provided the radiant idol isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the radiant idol. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, a creature is immune to this radiant idol's Aura of False Divinity for 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The radiant idol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The radiant idol makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Flail
entries: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Strike (1/Day)
entries: The radiant idol chooses a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of it. A 30-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder of bright light appears there until the start of the radiant idol's next turn. Each creature in the cylinder when it appears or that ends its turn there must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Deadly Critical
entries: Rak Tulkhesh scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Rak Tulkhesh fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rak Tulkhesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Whirlwind of Weapons
entries: A magical aura of weapons surrounds Rak Tulkhesh in a 10 foot radius. At the start of each of his turns, any other creature in the aura takes 14 (4d6) force damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Rak Tulkhesh makes four weapon attacks.

actions.name: Spawned Melee Weapon
entries: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (3d12 + 9) force damage.

actions.name: Spawned Ranged Weapon
entries: rw 12 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
entries: Rak Tulkhesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than his own, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (his choice).

In a new form, Rak Tulkhesh retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Rak Tulkhesh makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: End Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Rak Tulkhesh casts dispel magic.

legendary.name: Provoke Rage (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of Rak Tulkhesh must succeed on a 24 Wisdom saving throw or use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged weapon attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary. This attack is made with advantage and gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.

traits.name: Shifting (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the shifter takes on a more bestial form for 1 minute or until it dies. The shifter gains 5 temporary hit points. It can make a bite attack when it activates this trait and also as a bonus action on each of its turns while in its bestial form.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
